data.title: I'm so glad that I stopped in!
data.text:
I recently went into this business and I was blown away! This is such a unique concept and fantastic idea. This store contains items from several different local vendors/people who used recycled and unique materials to recreate beautiful things. The prices are honestly not too bad, they are right on par with any big name retailer, but at least when you buy locally you know you're supporting your local economy, and perhaps a single mom trying to make a living. 

The store is absolutely gorgeous, and it smells amazing in there too. Some of the things you might find in there include natural soaps, candles, beautiful bracelets, scarves, clothes, natural baby products like teething rings, and paintings. I purchased this beautiful clutch, and I've already gotten several compliments on it. This summer they're offering different workshops for kids which is fantastic!

The owner is probably the friendliest person I've ever met. The entire experience was fantastic, this will be my to go place for gifts and clutches. I promise you, check this place out and you will not be disappointed!

owner_response.author: TrashedStudio, Owner at Trashed Studio, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the review!!! Come back & visits us soon
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unique Studio
data.text: Trashed is a fun, unique art studio that focuses on creating crafts using recycled goods and shopping local by offering a variety of boutique and handmade items for purchase. Art classes for adults and children (the Litterbugs) are available as well! Wonderful! :)

owner_response.author: TrashedStudio, Owner at Trashed Studio, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The Place To Be!!
data.text: Trashed is THE place to be when you’re in Concord!  It’s the spot to create, learn, shop & be inspired… I mean, really, what more could you want?!

data.title: A Concord Gem!
data.text: Trashed is a wonderful place to let your creativity shine!  Instructors provide guidance for making beautiful projects, while allowing your own unique imagination to soar.  My 5 year-old LOVES this place and always comes home with the cutest, most creative projects.  I love how it is teaching her to re-use objects to create beautiful things. It's a win-win!  You have to try this place!

data.title: A MUST Experience!
data.text: No excuses you need to give Trashed a try!  For the creative and "creatively challenged" alike.  I am a repeat customer and I love inviting my friends and out of town visitors!  Never disappointed!

data.title: Creative, artistic, FUN
data.text: The concept of Trashed is  progressive and creative.  From the atmosphere to the projects clients complete Trashed is an experience for all ages to enjoy and learn from.  Trashed is a "can't miss" when visiting Concord!

data.title: Must visit this creative gem in the heart of  Historic Downtown Concord!
data.text: Trashed is not only a place to let your creative side run wild, it is filled with inspiration and excitement at all times. From the moment you walk in you breath a fresh perspective and feel inspired to create something out of nothing. Jessica & her staff help to facilitate your creativity in an encouraging and positive way. I had my bridal shower at Trashed and all my guests could not stop raving about what an awesome unique gem this is in Concord. They also offer children's art classes, birthday parties, and ladies nights! Fun literally for everyone!  If you haven't checked it out, you should!
